reviews.text: A pale yellow beer with an OK head. The aroma is slightly malty with notes of straws. The flavor is slightly malty too from a good malt blend despite the color. It ends on a slight bitterness and has a good palate. An above average beer. I must say I was suprised of the quality and that it actually tasted of something.
Red brownish colour with a medium mostly lasting white head. Aroma of malt and caramel. Bitter alcoholic finish.
Aroma: Sweet corn and fruits. Flavour: sweet berries and corn with some fruity bitterness and a slightly bitter finish. Colour: amber with a white head.
